transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Yeah. Uh yes ma'am yesterday we had word regarding IndiaMART.
Executive: One second.
Customer: Yeah. Yeah we had.
Customer: Uh they have told that they want a field visit. We spoken to the sales manager like I mean he told that they had a discussion something. So they will rectify it.
Customer: Because they are in the mail every pointers were written and it quoted that you want regular visit which is not possible ma'am your account is assigned to us. Tele servicing right? So we are gonna deal with all the queries.
Executive: Okay but M given like call back that they will be arranging that and monthly visit or whatever is required and all the like uh through Google Meet you can attend all the meetings everything. And field visit they will have a word and they will rectify this that's what they told.
Customer: Who told?
Executive: M told. M called me given a call back that uh they will rectify the issue so.
Executive: So they told to attend all the meetings that's what all the Google Meet and whatever meetings are being given through calls you can also attend that. In case if they want in case if we want any uh are not being rectified they will uh they will rectify it and they will arrange a person to come and meet your showroom everything that's what they told.
Customer: But that is the only thing that uh you I asked you to convey that here it is assigned to tele servicing right? Okay no issues I'll I'll talk to them and get back to you okay?
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants a field visit.

- Regular visits are not possible.



Resolution:

- Executive said they will rectify the issue.

- Customer can attend meetings through Google Meet.

- Executive will talk and get back to customer.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- field visit, tele servicing, google meet
